description.ruby-sapphire:
The user faints and lowers
the foe’s abilities.
description.emerald:
The user faints and lowers
the foe’s abilities.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user faints,
but sharply lowers
the foe’s ATTACK
and SP. ATK.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user faints upon
using this move.
In return, it sharply
lowers the target’s
Attack and Sp. Atk.
